name: PRO GK CLASSIC ROLLFINGER YELLOW
description:
The Pro GK Classic roll finger  goalkeeping gloves feature a new Super soft 4mm german latex palm for unrivalled grip in all weather conditions. The  roll finger palm cut with wrapover thumb provides an increased ball contact area with comfortable fit. 

Goalkeeper gloves 

• 4mm super soft German latex roll finger palm . 

• EVA Cushioned backhand 

• Performance when it's kept damp 

•  main pro logo on the backhand
